pages.text: The realm is a description of the level of cultivation. people divide the same realm into five stages: preliminary stage, midterm stage, sophisticated stage, close to perfection stage and perfection stage. When reach the close to perfection stage, entity can begin to try to break through to next realm.

Cultivation is the result of people's accumulated experience, and it is the sum of combat, elixir, skill, popularity and so on. With the increase of cultivation, people will gradually encounter the bottleneck of the current realm, and they must seek a breakthrough at this time.

Creatures of different levels had great differences in combat. The damage caused by low-level creatures to high-level creatures would be reduced by 90% every realm difference, while the damage caused by high-level creatures to low-level creatures would be increased by 10% every realm difference. Moreover, most creatures had intimidation spell, which could exert pressure on low-level creatures within range.
